scripts.deploy: near contract deploy test.guantong.testnet use-file ./build/ormp_aggregator.wasm without-init-call network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.inspect: near contract inspect test.guantong.testnet network-config testnet now
scripts.meta: near contract call-function as-read-only test.guantong.testnet contract_source_metadata json-args {} network-config testnet now
scripts.storage: near contract view-storage test.guantong.testnet all as-json network-config testnet now
scripts.clear: near contract call-function as-transaction test.guantong.testnet _clear_state json-args {} prepaid-gas '100.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as test.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
scripts.publish-test: near contract call-function as-transaction test.guantong.testnet publish json-args {} prepaid-gas '300.0 Tgas' attached-deposit '0 NEAR' sign-as test.guantong.testnet network-config testnet sign-with-legacy-keychain send
